column4: my computer wont boot ubuntu unless "acpi=off" is set in grub, it used to work without that.. and nothing has really changed BIOS wise.. help? I cant suspend or anything without ACPI can I?
Is there an error message if you don't use acpi=off?
no the screen just goes black from boot and nothing
Perhaps check your apt logs to see what changed around the time it broke.. Else I can't help, sorry.
oh this is form a fresh install. it didnt suddenly jsut happen
